1.brief: hence, from this place, on this side and on that
1.long: hence, from this place, on this side and on that.

1.long: from out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards.

14.brief: I cause to disappear, I hide, remove, disfigure
14.long: I cause to disappear, hide, remove; I disfigure (probably by leaving unwashed for a long period), destroy.
